content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (43, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position (43.0, -82.0)) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace (position (45.0, -82.0)) with coal as fuel but no ingredients to smelt

### Burner Mining Drill at position (40, -84)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position (40.0, -84.0)) with no fuel

### Wooden Chest at position (39.5, -85.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position (39.5, -85.5)) containing 196 coal

### Copper Plate Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position (x1)) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position (z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to fuel
- Ensure that the Burner Mining Drill has fuel before attempting to use it. Check the inventory and add fuel if necessary.

### Errors related to smelting
- Ensure that the Stone Furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt. Check the inventory and insert required materials if needed.
